description:
MeeGo is Intel‘s open source OS targeted to netbooks which includes Intel’s software store for laptops called Intel AppUp Center. The combination of both creates new usage models where end consumers can find solutions to their problems with few clicks and all in a ones top shop. The MeeGo/AppUp offering is open for developers looking for reaching those users. This talk will introduce MeeGo and AppUp SDK’s for developing applications targeted to millions of users.

   • Sponsored by Intel
title: Developing MeeGo/AppUp Applications
